title: swain makes everyone lag
body:
since release, reworked swains mere presence in the game causes intermittent lag. generally when he uses abilities but sometimes just when he moves or takes damage.

please fix

replies.body:
If you're experiencing a bug the best place to post about it is in the Report a Bug board over on NA, looks like a few people have reported issues with Swain already, so checking in on one of those threads to say you're experiencing the issue as well is the best things you can do rn.

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report
